Summary: Rhoda Jackson is an accomplished Graphic Designer with experience at Mozilla, Carta Healthcare, and Emanate, holding a B.F.A. in Visual Arts from the University of Chicago. At Mozilla, she significantly improved ad performance by 19% and content shareability by 57% through the design of marketing video assets and the creation of graphic design standards. Her prior role at Carta Healthcare saw her boost social engagement by 32% and slash cost per acquisition by 18% by developing original graphics and implementing A/B testing. She also gained foundational experience designing for 17 clients and creating visual content that garnered over 1,600 engagement points during her internship.
